Light Matrix¶

class src.light_matrix.MatrixController(con)¶

Controller for the LED light matrix and what to show on it.

Parameters

con (main.Controller) – Reference to main controller

load_image(image: str)¶

Shows a 8x8 image on the LED matrix

Parameters

image (str) – The image filename

set_framerate(framerate: int)¶

Sets the framerate of the main loop so that the controller can calculate how long to show each frame.

Parameters

framerate (int) – The number update() calls per second

start_sequence(cam_changed: bool, acc_changed: bool, gyro_changed: bool)¶

Handles changing the current frame sequence in response to a possible deviance found after measuring the hardware components.

Parameters

  • cam_changed (bool) – Whether the camera value deviated

  • acc_changed (bool) – Whether the accelerometer value deviated

  • gyro_changed (bool) – Whether the gyroscope value deviated

update()¶

Handles the iteration and dynamics of the frame sequences. Should be called once per main loop cycle after the framerate has been set in the set_framerate() method.

It works by either keeping the current frame, or moving onto the next frame in the sequence. If no more frames are stated, it defaults to showing FrameSequence.idle.
